title: why riot doesn't answer my ticket
body: I submitted 2 tickets asking for help, in this tickets I wrote if is it possible to get my RP back because I went afk for about  2 hours  and when I come back I didn't see my 1350 RP and when I search the  history I see that a gift was sent to a person that I don't even know it was omega Squad tristana he didn't still receive the gift I hope some of riot will help me please

replies.body:
It's good that you've submitted that ticket already, as I don't really be able to process refunds here on the boards. Those EU agents should be responding shortly, so be sure to check your email periodically for their response! 

It also sounds like you might have been hacked, so I'd also consider submitted another ticket to our account team by choosing the option "I need help recovering my account".

they sed that can't be refunded why?
I need help on this is stupid is offline I didn't sent the gift i jsut wanna the rp back for buing orbs
they sed that can't be refunded why?
